articles.author: Winnie Hsu, Ruth Carson
articles.title: Asian Stocks Look Subdued Ahead of Jackson Hole: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg
articles.description: Financial markets moved in narrow ranges, with global equities holding near record highs, after Donald Trump’s meeting with Ukraine’s president and European leaders ended with a call for a summit with Russia.
articles.content: Financial markets moved in narrow ranges, with global equities holding near record highs, after Donald Trumps meeting with Ukraines president and European leaders ended with a call for a summit with … [+355 chars]

articles.author: Paul Dallison
articles.title: 5 oddest moments from European leaders’ trip to see Trump - politico.eu
articles.description: When the U.S. president is involved, anything can happen. EU leaders appear to have gotten off quite lightly this time.
articles.content:
Trump interjected, I said the same thing. Turning to Zelenskyy, Trump added helpfully, Thats the one that attacked you last time.
I remember that, Zelenskyy replied dryly, earning chuckles from the … [+1218 chars]
